SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.Utils

Class AnchoredPopUp

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.Utils.AnchoredPopUp
public class AnchoredPopUp extends Object
This class represents a popup that is anchored to a side of the parent. The popup will open and close with a slide animation when the mouse enters and exits the content.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnchoredPopUp

      public AnchoredPopUp(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane parent, float widthPercentage, float heightPercentage, javafx.geometry.Pos alignment, float closedPercentage)
      Creates a new anchored popup
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent of the popup
      widthPercentage - the width of the popup as a percentage of the parent's width
      heightPercentage - the height of the popup as a percentage of the parent's height
      alignment - the alignment of the popup. The available options are Pos.TOP_CENTER, Pos.BOTTOM_CENTER, Pos.CENTER_RIGHT, Pos.CENTER_LEFT
      closedPercentage - the percentage of the respective side that the popup will be once closed
      closedPercentage - the percentage of the respective side that the popup will be once closed

  • Method Details

    • open

      public void open()
      Opens the popup

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the popup

    • setLocked

      public void setLocked(boolean isLocked)
      Locks the popup, meaning that it will not close when the mouse exits the content nor open when it enters
      Parameters:
      isLocked - true to lock the popup, false to unlock it

    • getContent

      public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getContent()
      Returns:
      the reference to the content of the popup. Use this to add elements to the popup
